bgm.name: 水泊梁山 (主城)
bgm.description: 雄壮、开阔、归属感。以笛子和古筝开场，随后加入厚重的弦乐与远处的号角。Prompt: Epic Chinese martial arts theme, majestic bamboo flute melody, grand orchestral strings, traditional guzheng plucking, sense of brotherhood and honor, cinematic, wide stereo.

bgm.name: 东京汴梁 (繁华都市)
bgm.description: 喧闹、市井、宫廷感。快节奏的琵琶与中阮，伴随轻快的打击乐。Prompt: Bustling ancient Chinese city ambience, upbeat Pipa and Zhongruan, lively percussion, festive atmosphere, Northern Song Dynasty style, traditional folk ensemble.

bgm.name: 快活林酒肆 (酒馆)
bgm.description: 悠闲、江湖、微醺感。低沉的胡琴伴随偶尔的木鱼声，节奏松散。Prompt: Relaxing tavern music, low Erhu melody, wooden percussion, rustic atmosphere, drunken folk style, intimate and warm, traditional Chinese inn vibes.

bgm.name: 荒野/林间 (探索)
bgm.description: 肃杀、紧迫、危机四伏。极简的打击乐，伴随凄凉的萧声。Prompt: Desolate wilderness, eerie Xiao (vertical flute) solo, minimalist dark percussion, suspenseful, wind blowing soundscape, traditional Chinese mystery.

bgm.name: 杂兵遭遇战
bgm.description: 节奏明快，鼓点密集。快节奏的二胡拉弦与中国大鼓。Prompt: Fast-paced combat music, intense Chinese Taiko drums, rapid Erhu tremolo, energetic martial arts action, high adrenaline, traditional percussion ensemble.

bgm.name: 英雄对决 (BOSS战)
bgm.description: 震撼、史诗、压迫感。唢呐领奏，伴随厚重的管弦乐与人声合唱。Prompt: Epic boss battle theme, heroic Suona (Chinese trumpet) lead, powerful cinematic orchestra, deep male choir, intense rhythmic tension, legendary hero confrontation.

bgm.name: 攻城掠地 (大型战场)
bgm.description: 宏大、悲壮、混乱。沉重的号角，密集的战鼓，金属撞击般的节奏。Prompt: Massive war theme, deep war horns, thunderous battle drums, chaotic orchestral brass, tragic heroism, large scale battlefield atmosphere.

bgm.name: 兄弟结义/庆功
bgm.description: 豪迈、暖心、明亮。唢呐高亢但柔和，伴随响亮的锣鼓。Prompt: Joyful celebration theme, bright Suona melody, festive gongs and cymbals, warm brotherhood atmosphere, triumphant Chinese folk music.

bgm.name: 英雄陨落/悲剧
bgm.description: 凄凉、哀恸。极慢的二胡长音，伴随空灵的古琴。Prompt: Sorrowful funeral theme, weeping Erhu solo, minimalist Guqin, tragic and emotional, slow tempo, sense of loss and mourning.

sfx.name: 脚步声 (草地)
sfx.description: 干燥的草叶摩擦声。(Dry grass crunching, light leather boot steps)

sfx.name: 脚步声 (木板)
sfx.description: 沉重的木头回响，模拟酒楼地板。(Thumping wood floor, creaking planks, heavy footsteps)

sfx.name: 攻击 (挥砍)
sfx.description: 凌厉的破空声。(Sharp sword swoosh, high-frequency air cutting)

sfx.name: 攻击 (打击)
sfx.description: 重型钝器（如鲁智深禅杖）击中肉体的闷响。(Heavy blunt impact, bone crushing thud, deep bass)

sfx.name: 受击 (甲片撞击)
sfx.description: 角色受击时金属盔甲的震动声。(Metallic armor clinking, chainmail impact)

sfx.name: 死亡 (倒地)
sfx.description: 沉重的躯体撞击尘土的声音。(Heavy body fall, dust impact, thud)

sfx.name: 水泊波动
sfx.description: 梁山水泊微弱的浪花拍岸声。(Gentle lake ripples, water splashing against wooden boat, serene nature)

sfx.name: 战场环境
sfx.description: 远处的厮杀声、马鸣声、旗帜在风中猎猎作响。(Distant battlefield screams, horse neighing, cloth fluttering in strong wind, chaotic background)

sfx.name: 风雪 (山神庙)
sfx.description: 寒风呼啸，夹杂着雪粒撞击木门的声音。(Howling winter wind, blizzard ambience, rattling wooden door)

sfx.name: UI 点击/确认
sfx.description: 响亮的木板快板声或清脆的玉石碰撞声。(Crisp Chinese woodblock clack, jade stone clinking, positive feedback)

sfx.name: UI 取消/返回
sfx.description: 沉闷的纸张翻动声。(Heavy paper parchment rustling, low frequency thud)

sfx.name: 任务达成
sfx.description: 清脆的铃铛声伴随短促的古筝扫弦。(Clear bell chime, short Guzheng glissando, rewarding sound)

sfx.name: 道具 (饮酒)
sfx.description: 液体倒入瓷碗的咕嘟声，随后是豪爽的摔碗声。(Liquid pouring into ceramic bowl, glugging sound, ceramic bowl shattering)

sfx.name: 道具 (拾取铜钱)
sfx.description: 大量金属硬币碰撞的清脆声。(Jingling copper coins, metallic clinking, money bag handling)

sfx.name: 道具 (展开卷轴)
sfx.description: 粗糙纸张或丝绸摩擦展开的声音。(Unrolling ancient paper scroll, friction sound of silk and parchment)
